column5: Yep.. Dan Williams.. Industrial Filters. I knew whom you meant for sure..

You dont 'notice' very much on OFC, it comes right out and smacks you in the eye. Need a friend..........ya got lots need help..............ya get lots Need Spiritual support..You'll get it With all this, who the Heck needs fishing? and this is from an :old Fart:
IF it weren't for fishing, a lot of us would not have a life.
If it weren't for computers and the internet a lot of us would get more done.
Thats like saying if there were no cars we'd all get more exercise.  If there were not internet there would be no OFC.  edit: Like any invention (fire, guns, planes,etc) its a double edged sword.
Thanks for sucking the life out of a tongue in cheek comment that was meant to make light of how much time I spend on the computer on this site.

...its funny because its true  I notice the more things change, the more they stay the same. Lots of new faces come and go, but the core stays the same. Pay a visit to Lakair in June and you'll see who I mean.
The one big thing that I have noticed is that I have never met an OFNer that I didn't like...mind you...  There are some I'm not in a hurry to meet...!!!

That reminded me of this famous quote,   "I don't know half of you half as well as I should like; and I like less than half of you half as well as you deserve." - Bilbo Baggins  kickingfrog sorry man but I could't tell if you were being serious or not without emoticons. like
Roy does look up to everybody...literally.
* crosses sirfish off the Christmas card list*
At least we don't look down on you......
No big deal, I didn't 'splain it too well.
Lets start a poll
No one comes to this site anymore, cause it's to crowded.

oh were else has their own cabin fever cartoon  [media][/media] <embed width="600" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowFullscreen="true" allowNetworking="all" wmode="transparent" src="http://static.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid25.photobucket.com/albums/c52/Mrbeee1954/ofnfever.flv">

T.J.gets upset when you win 6 tickets to a show in 3 minutes  A $9 beer tastes the same as every other beer  I will never be up before Lew  You gotta know when to stop typing  Every month a car debate will happen  Stoty loves the leafs
NO, NO, NO, the one thing that lots of people get wrong on this site is that a pickerel is not a pickerel.  ITS A WALLEYE!!!!
Na... it's a PICKERAL Tom! Get it right..
You cannot hide from Wayne, he even helps himself to your beer.  Right TJ?  Terry get's moody  Joey is always in a good mood, so is Bly.  We have the best pro's here and helping out all the time.
All these many years on this site, and, ....................oh heck, never mind. Call them pickerel if you want to,   :lol:  :lol:
How could I not be around here, I'm surrounded by Fish and Men!!!

It is the first site in your favorites that you go to and read, 'cause ya never know.... we have our own resident rednecks, one Canadian, an' one from "Bama We don't need a "stirrin' the pot" emoticon, "cause everyone knows when it is being done. The only site I know of with its' own ANTHEM, (Thanks Cliff!) One of the few sites that accepts you as you are and (usually) doesn't toss you out.

nerds? jeez, i guess you havent really seen half of us then eh? what are these "OLD people" you speak of? ...............................................................................................................................   -people like to argue.  -southerners like to take cracks at the northern folk and vice versa.  -uhhhh.... how to actually catch a friggin salmon in a none illegal way  -....... that chewing tobacco is for "sissy's" lol.
why you....someone made my hit list...LOL
LmAo!
...Rob Hyatt and/or Common Carp is the answer to any contest or trivia question.
the rabbit, the steeple  and the OFC weekend at .Rob Hyatt's, that no one talks about
Lake X has every species of fish found in Ontario in it.

-Never fish for brown trout cause all you will catch are Atlantic's -Spinning reels are ineffective. -Never catch fish over 20lb's or you must sit in the penatly box and feel shame. -Quebec reports are AWESOME -New people apparently hate the forum despite visiting often -Steelheading is an art (not to be confused with fun) -Religious or Political discussion is not recommended but reeeeeely entertaining -EHG has stones of steel fishing in Lake Ontario in a 12'tinner mid winter -Bunks epic posts are Magazine worthy -I hate Solo...only cause I don't understand how he does what he does -Dawg and Holdfast are my 2 favorite posters cause they say it like it is. -DanC...Takes "Speck"tacular photos, and those trout are simply amazing -Rick seems to smart too talk to sometimes -Lew somehow makes Musky look easy....and sometime they look happier then he is?  But most of all I've noticed a great bunch of folk with a sence of humor, in this active community.
... that Tillers are a far superior boat to all others!
Oh look! a can of worms, let's open it!
- many members have strong opinions on the 2 stroke VS 4 stroke debate - look back far enough and somebody has fished the spot your going to.
Marshmallows are the secret bait  Ya mean Stoty bleeds blue n white???
The people are a little nutso...  Words like  DANG  SWILL  SWILLERS  ELITISM  SHOAL CARP  Etc.  Good morning Paul Dillon.
Oh Yeah...Tents go on hills.
He's going for more posts in a night than he's posted in 3 years Albert... leave him alone.. lol
moi?  Hey Wayne!!!  How tings up your way?  One of my favorite old customers is just down the street from you.
Na.. your buddy from the other thread Steve.. mods housecleaned the thread!  Danny is still doing WELL. Bought our big building last year(right behind his) to expand and store his goods.
Good to hear.  I believe we are speaking of the same company making filters?

I have noticed, especially while I was working my way through my lurking stage, the following: -someone will inquire as to how to fix an aluminum boat -someone will ask what is the best reel for... -a spot is not just the name of your dog -the amount of beer consumed by OFC'ers could probably float many boats -there are way to many Hab fans here! -a white bucket is a terrible thing to waste -smiling while holding your catch is highly over rated -"crappie" is not just how we feel the morning after a GTG Feel free to carry on! HH
-that it's always "time" somewhere !
:lol:  It's not just a fishing site. Anything goes, well at least until it gets locked down.
There's a lot of folks out there that need a breathalyzer hooked up to their keyboard
Doh! I can't believe I forgot that one Wayne! Any time, is a good time! HH

I've noticed: - We're mostly exempt from debates over which World Record Organization is credible, thank goodness. - Someone will recognize that spot. - someone will recognize that spot, even with a blurred background. - someone will object to you talking about that spot, but when you do, the reports here are better than a lot of stuff you see in magazines. - the gang here know a lot about how to find a good deal on a boat, or anything else, for that matter. - There are enough pros on this board to fill a tournament - TJ seems to lead some kind of charmed life - It actually is something of a community
- that you should not drink and BBQ - dwarfs are lovable - tutu's are underrated - someone will ask your profession at least once a year - someone will ask to have a fishing only forum twice a year
Drink and BBQ? Perhaps I missed that tale?
I might get flamed but I've noticed this:  -Too many trolls -Too many old people -The young people are nerds
My wife will never understand what I "see" in this place... but she's ok with that. She's a keeper for sure.
An oldie but a goodie.  I think Rick tells the story best.
And JP sustained the most injuries.
What is an OLD  person?
Someone that's not still in Public School Mccann!
Somebody who knows better, as opposed to one who knows it all
The older I get the smarter my dad gets
There's way too many guys out there thinkin they can catch as many as me

4 times a year someone will request a sub section for nonfishing topics like this one  once a year one member will go away for 6 months and still have more posts then anyone else  oh and once every 15 years someone makes it so everyone can see their own C Drive on this web page it freaks people out.........only a few have been here long enough to remember that one  and where else but OFC is there the NAME that can't be said, typed or whispered, for fear he will return
Good 'ol "What's his name" ? .. or are you talking that Dill pickle guy.. lol  Go away.. once a year...
give the man a cigar I guess make that 2 cigars
well for one.  if your from quebec people dont reply to you reports .
Kevin, that's not true at all and I'm sure you know that.

Musky Burgers aren't as popular as they used to be  There are no fish in Lake Simcoe  Lew Oclock just doesnt seem the same now that Lew's in the boonies  Dawgless days arent nearly as interesting as they used to be  There is only one place in Ontario to catch HUMUNGULOUS Catfish ... and without giving away the secret ... cough ... cough Dunville ... cough ... cough  If you havent fished with Lloyd ... you havent seen real-man Pickerel  If you havent fished with DANC you havent seen beaudacious Brookies ...  If you havent fished with Scott ... sorry .. IF YOU HAVENT FISHED WITH CC ... you havent seen chrome ....  If you havent fished with Lew ... well ... the lets just say the musky are safe  Oh .. and did I mention the musky Burgers are no longer on the menu ?
Hey there has been no talk about Cabin fever this year? What gives???
..but that kind of asinine statement and there'll be less I can guarantee...
